Q: Detecting human presence in a WhatsApp chat to pause a chatbot A:

it can be achieve by using a flag in db.

add a column in users table, e.g. auto_ai_reply (1= on, 0= off)

when admin open chat, make it 0 for that user... and now bot stops replying for that user. you can also give power to admin by adding a toggle in admin chat UI, so he/she can manually enable or disable the bot per user.

in messages table add a role column (admin, user, bot). if the last message sent by admin keep the bot off. if admin only reads and leave the chat, turn it on.

run a cron job, if the admin hasn't respond for 30-60 minutes, auto on the bot.
optional: column auto_ai_reply can be datetime so by default when on make it NULL but when admin opens the chat store current timestamp...

Q: How to sync zimbra calendar with google calendar in both direction A:

I found a way to do it, but only to locally sync the calendar on an android mobile device.

We need to install the application DAVx5 (charged on Play Store, but free on fdroid), then connect to the Zimbra account to locally sync the calendar.

Then from Google Agenda app, we go to Settings → Manage Accounts, and the calendar should appear in the section Non-Google Account. (source)

This feed is quite old, but maybe this answer could help someone in the future (as I landed here when I looked how to do it !)
